//event form Change Banner
//reset password Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password. Registered Email Address Send me a link to reset
//Introduction fragment Nimas Education
//event layout {mdi-map-marker 30px}
//appointment full details Appointment Full Details NIMAS Education has a policy of arranging crowd in a systematic way. In order to meet any staffs for official purpose, you should make an appointment in advance so that we can process your request quickly on time. We know your value of time and waiting is a tedious job! To avoid delay and long waiting in queue, please book your appointment today. If you have any problem in taking appointment, please contact us via email: appointment@nimaseducation.com
//eligibility full details Eligibility Full Details //apply now //personal info Year Intake* Course* Country* Country Country(Optional) Title* Middle Name Date Of Birth* Place Of Birth* Gender* Nationality* Marital Status* Citizenship No* Passport No Date Of Issue Date Of Expiry Place Of Issue
//apply now //mailing address Permanent Address Street Name Number City State | Province Mobile* Email* Is This Your Permanent Address? *
//apply now //Education School Name Qualification Obtained CGPA | GPA | Grade | % Date Of Completion
//apply now //high school certificate High School Name
//apply now //undergraduate certificate University Degree Obtained Major Subject
Do You Have More Qualification? Test Taken Test Score Please indicate the date(s) and the score of the test(s) taken.
//apply now //Current Employment Current Employer Field Of Activity Position Location Start Date Department Employment Type Describe Your Responsibilities
//apply now //Previous Job Experience Employer Job Title End Date Please write in brief describing why you want to study, chosen course and your future career plan. *
//apply now //Attach Document Photograph ( Passport Size) * Resume * Passport Copy ( Front and Back Page Only ) Citizenship Copy ( Front and Last Page Only School Education Certificate High School Certificate Undergraduate Certificate Graduate Certificate Test Choose File Change File No file chosen Your Signature Date Of Signature Please indicate the date(s) and score of the test(s) taken.
I understand and accept the terms and conditions that govern the admissions procedure and participation in any program at NIMAS Education. I certify that the information I have provided in the application is complete and accurate and attached my documents are genuine and honestly presented.

\"Think for the development and start doing it\"
// Nimas R & K Associates is a licensed and approved educational consultancy by the Government of Nepal, Ministery of Industry, Company of Registrar, Ministry of Education and Minstry of Finance, Inland Revenue Department as well as an ISO 9001:2008 certified company in Nepal who specializes in overseas education, immigration services and quality teaching in entrance perparation. Our specialized team has been advising students for their higher education overseas plans since its establishment. We are located in Kathmandu- capital city and the educational hub of the country. Copyright © 2018 R & K Associates. All Rights Reserved Powered by Susankya Tech Pvt.Ltd Bagbazar, Kathmandu, Nepal (Opposite to PK Campus) +977-01-4167542 info@rkassociates.com.np rkassociates.edu.np www.rkassociates.com \@rkassociates R & K Associates R & K An ISO 9001:2008 Certified Company
